reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Narda Clone, Single coil  26g Kanthal @.7 ohms.  25W Power, Half wicked with Tencel

**Testing:** Flavorah Cheesecake @ 1%. 70/30 VG/PG, steeped 15 days.

**Flavor Description:**  Plain slightly sweet creamy cheesecake. Nice thick mouth feel, not too much cheesy tartness but enough to let you know you are vaping a cheesecake and not just sweet milk. Complete with a touch of graham cracker crust. 

**Off-flavors:**  Very clean flavor with nothing that should not be there.

**Throat Hit:**  Smooth as buttah (at least after a steep).

**Uses & Pairings:**  I am going to be using this in place of cap ny cheesecake or tfa cheesecake (graham crust). You can pair this with your favorite fruit topping or add it to a cream or custard for some rich smoothness. 

**Notes:**
I have been very disappointed with cheesecake flavors. None of them seem very authentic or satisfying to me but this is on point with what I always thought a cheesecake flavor should be. 

**Second Opinions:**

Why can't I ever find notes for the flavors I want to review? Argh. Maybe I am just bad at the internet.

**[DIY_eJuice Flavor Reviews](https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/wiki/index/flavor_reviews)**

If you have different opinions on the flavor or any ideas on how to use it please post them in the comments. Lets start a discussion!
reviewsJson.author: mlNikon
reviewsJson.title: Cheesecake
